title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning-Based Graphene Absorber Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Electromagnetism and Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Combined theory-practice learning through VR-based graphene structure manipulation and machine learning model application exercises.

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental operating principles of graphene-based absorbers from an electromagnetic perspective
Implement a spectral prediction model utilizing five machine learning algorithms (kNN, ANN, DT, ETs, RF) in a simulated environment
Apply RF algorithms to inverse design problems to propose optimal graphene absorber structures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
